gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Trie

Class PersistentTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Trie.PersistentTree

  • public class PersistentTree
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a mechanism of persistent tree. One file is capable of storing multiple trie trees. However, we use one only tree in one file in our application for simplicity reason.

    The file format is:

    • 0~3: int: level
    • 4~11: long: address for next node
    • 12~19: long: address for parent node
    • 20~27: long: address for child list
    • 28~x: specific data (length varies)

    History:

    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
    See Also:
    Design Document
